Package org.judal.storage

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConstraintsChecker
    Interface for Record data check.
    DataSource
    Base interface for DataSource implementations
    Engine<GenericDataSource extends DataSource>
    Interface for Engine instances.
    FieldHelper
    Interface for adaptors of non-standard field types.
    ForeignKeyChecker
    Interface for foreign key checkers.
    ImportLoader
    Interface for performing bulk loads into tables
    Operation
    Interface for load, store, exists and delete operation wrapper.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EngineFactory
    Engine registry and default data source keeper.
    Env
    Helper methods to read properties from environment to create data sources and other objects.
    Param
    Input or output parameter for insert, update, exist or fetch methods.
    StandardConstraintsChecker  
    StorageContext
    Container for a set of data sources used together by a client application.
    StorageObjectFactory
    Factory for storage objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ErrorCode
    Authentication error codes.
    Param.Direction  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IntegrityViolationException
    Exception to throw when an integrity constraint is violated.
